title: Sunday Catch Up
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Hey Mary, I missed you last night but rewatching now and I can answer the question from @CatherineSummers Yes! That’s our Sarah as Doctor Caron in Serenity ...who is onscreen briefly yet impactfully and screams so muthatruckin’ GLORIOUSLY that I became an instant life-long stan. Because of that I sought out everything she touched so I’ve been head over heels in love with American Horror Story since before the first season was even called Murder House. The wait paid off in spades when she became our girl Lana Banana and I heard those beautifully mellifluous cries again. ;o}
Its confirmed Mary WE GOT THE TEASER YAYYY
MARY READ THIS IS CONFORMED FOR TOMORROW  BECAUSE THE DIRECTOR FOR FX AND THE TEASERS REPLIED TO SOMEBODY IN HIS COMMENTS AND SAID ITS FOR TOMMOROW
Mary Girl ❤️ YOU!! Great Video.  Sorry I missed the LIVE Stream. 🕷️🕸️🍁🍂🌜🎃😈💀👹👻
